description.description: Description of the files structure on S3.

location.description: Location of the files on S3. */* patterns are supported. {model} can be used and will be replaced by the models listed in the data contract.

file_format.description: Format of the files hosted on S3. csv, json or parquet are supported.

ref_encryption_key.description: Name of the symetric encryption key (or http reference in the Key store - not yet supported) used to by the data provider to encrypte data.

region.description: AWS region where the files are hosted.

encryption_key.description: AES 256 symetric encryption key used to encrypt files at rest - works only for parquet files.

key_id.description: Key id to access the files on AWS S3.

secret.description: Secret to access the files on AWS S3
